content: Medium metal reciprocating saw blades (heavy-duty) Longer-lasting reciprocating saw blade for cutting 3.5-10 mm (1/8 - 7/16) thick metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful, durable bimetal blades optimized for cutting medium-thick metal pipes, plates, structures etc. Increased width and thickness – the ideal blade for when you need precise, straight cuts Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Cleaner cuts through medium-thick metal components (3.5-10 mm or 1/8 - 7/16) Cutting medium-thick metal plate Cutting pipes Cutting structural steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 14 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 14 | Blade features | Long life, Heavy duty ### ITEMS- 2179713 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 14 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179712 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 14 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2179722 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 14 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179721 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 14 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2218787 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 14 (200) metal - Package Size 200 pc - 2179728 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 14 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179727 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 14 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc
